document_data.name: Harammamyl H'tithet
document_data.mainbody: '''Harammamyl H'tithet''' was the main [[drow]] delegate in [[Mantol-Derith]].
document_data.Personality: Harammamyl hid well her disgust for other races and even understood that a little false compassion helped in business.
document_data.History: Harammamyl was a member of the merchant [[House H'tithet]]. In [[1372 DR]], she became a delegate to Mantol-Derith after assassinating her predecessor, [[Yyssisiryl H'tithet]]. However, the [[Siege of Menzoberranzan]] prevented travel to her home city and for the time, Harammamyl, like [[Kassawar Plickenstint]], had very little to do.
